title: Constructing child-friendly cities: Comprehensive evaluation of street-level child-friendliness using the method of empathy-based stories, street view images, and deep learning
content:
Publication date: November 2024

Source: Cities, Volume 154

Author(s): Yihong Yang, Qi Wang, Dongchen Wu, Tian Hang, Haonan Ding, Yunfei Wu, Qiqi Liu
